description:
Embark on an epic adventure that leads you through a beautiful isometric open world with detailed high-definition visuals. Rainbow Moon is a role-playing game with a strong emphasis on exploration, character development and turn-based battles. Customize 6 playable main characters with upgradeable weapons, armor and accessories. About 120 special skills and more than 20 challenging dungeons await in a fascinating story that lasts over 40 epic hours!

With added balance customization features, Rainbow Moon for Nintendo Switch™ is the definitive way to experience this unforgettable classic and the perfect jumping-on point for all strategy RPG players.

Story:

Cursed by his arch-rival, Baldren finds himself warped to Rainbow Moon. To make matters worse, Baldren isn't only stranded in an unknown place, he’s also opened a dimensional gate out of which troops of monsters are crawling, turning this once peaceful planet into a living hell. There's only one thing for our brave hero to do. He must seal the gate and warp himself back to his home planet before it’s too late!

Features:

• Journey through a 40-hour main story with enough side missions to fill more than 100 hours!
• Explore an isometric open world with 15 different terrains, from snowy mountains to rolling grasslands.
• Complete 50 unique quests as you traverse 20 challenging dungeons!
• Engage in sophisticated turn-based combat with a vast array of skills and special attacks.
• Take command of 6 playable main characters with upgradable weapons, armor and accessories.
• Enjoy technically perfected gameplay and adjustable balance settings to customize the experience!
name: Rainbow Moon
